text: ۞عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ عَادَيۡتُم مِّنۡهُم مَّوَدَّةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ قَدِيرٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

translation.en: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful
translation.id: Mudah-mudahan Allah menumbuhkan kasih sayang di antara kamu dengan orang-orang yang pernah kamu musuhi di antara mereka. Allah Mahakuasa. Dan Allah Maha Pengampun, Maha Penyayang

translation.en: She that is to be examined
